en.name: Night of Fright
en.description: Increases the wearer's Energy Regeneration Rate by {{12//14//16//18//20%}}. When any ally uses their Ultimate, the wearer restores HP for the ally currently with the lowest HP percentage by an amount equal to {{10//11//12//13//14%}} of the healed ally's Max HP. When the wearer provides healing for an ally, increases the healed ally's ATK by {{2.4//2.8//3.2//3.6//4%}}. This effect can stack up to 5 times and lasts for 2 turn(s).

zh.name: 惊魂夜
zh.description: 使装备者的能量恢复效率提高{{12//14//16//18//20%}}。我方目标施放终结技时，装备者为当前生命值百分比最低的我方目标回复等同于其{{10//11//12//13//14%}}生命上限的生命值。当装备者为我方目标提供治疗时，使该目标的攻击力提高{{2.4//2.8//3.2//3.6//4%}}，该效果最多叠加5层，持续2回合。
